amendment.description: To create the National Endowment for the Oceans to promote the protection and conservation of United States ocean, coastal, and Great Lakes ecosystems.

action.text: Amendment SA 803 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 799.

vote.text: Amendment SA 803, under the order of 5/7/13, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 116.
